H0.text: Which vegetable was the first to be canned. Carrot

H1.text: Which vegetable was the first to be canned. Beetroot

H2.text: Which vegetable was the first to be canned. Onion

H3.text: Which vegetable was the first to be canned. Pea

A4.text: With the invention of canning, peas were one of the first vegetables to be canned.
